about_the_game:
◆ Story Synopsis ◆

  • In the year 3323, to eliminate the societal risks posed by extreme mental states, Primus and humanity jointly initiated the Meta Mirror Project, creating the Realm of Meta Mirror and the Enforcers. When individuals with obsessive tendencies volunteer for the project, their mental worlds are projected into the Meta Mirror Realm, transforming into bizarre entities called Mirrormazes. The Enforcer's mission is to enter these Mirrormazes, eliminate the Mirrormare, and guide individuals back to stability, ensuring societal harmony and safety.

  • During one mission, Enforcer Decem suffered a devastating blow, losing all memories. As Decem relearns how to fulfill the duties of an Enforcer, strange voices begin to reach out, attempting to communicate…

◆ Spatial Retracing ◆

  • Use the “Retrace” ability to teleport to spaces you've recently visited.

  • Retrace to the blind spots of relentless enemies for a surprise attack, or navigate through intricate mechanisms to solve puzzles with clever solutions.

◆ Puzzle-Solving + lite Souls-like Boss Fights ◆

  • In the Mirrormaze, obsessions take form as powerful enemies—some pilot colossal mechs to devastate the ground, others shroud your vision in darkness, or split their bodies into shifting shapes.

  • But every enemy has a weakness. Observe their mechanics, use abilities like Retrace strategically, and exploit openings to overcome formidable foes.

◆ Stylized Art ◆

  • The game features a soft and vibrant visual style. From ancient ruins to modern cities, the diverse environments of the Mirrormazes will always leave you amazed.

◆ Module Customization ◆

  • Collect Major Modules as rewards from boss battles and uncover hidden Minor Modules throughout the Mirrormazes.

  • Choose from 7 types of Major Modules and their variants, including parry, heavy slash, or dash skills. Equip over 20 minor modules as traits to craft a unique combat style.

◆ Determine the Fate of You and Your Companions ◆

  • Play as "Enforcer Decem," live alongside companions on the Motherboard, complete missions within the Mirrormaze, and share your insights.

  • The choices you make during key moments will lead to different endings.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
